data.name: 69 Natasha Hot
data.detailed_description:
69 Natasha Hot - is a game that contains elements of a novel and a memory puzzle. You meet a beautiful girl who is ready to show you around and tell you the secret of the local cuisine. Solve memory puzzles and get rewards you're sure to love.

Features


  • Atmospheric music
  • Meditative gameplay
  • Sweet Natasha

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7, Windows8, Windows10
  • Processor: Core i3,i5,i7,E3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GT 820M
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows7, Windows8, Windows10
  • Processor: Core i3,i5,i7,E3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GT 820M
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 820M
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
linux_requirements.recommended:
